1.text: You enter the room and notice a spike trap on the floor.

2.text: You enter the room and nearly trip over a tripwire

3.text: You are nearly caught off guard by an arrow trap as you enter the room.

4.text: A giant axe is held by a tripwire string in the room.

5.text: You notice a barrel of poisonous gas in the center of the room and expect it may be trapped.

6.text: As you enter the room the walls begin to close in on you.

7.text: As you enter the room water begins to flood the area.

8.text: As you enter the room it begins to heat up and you suspect there is an incendiary trap.

9.text: A moment after entering the room you notice a Mimic Chest off to one side.

10.text: After entering the room you nearly walk into a field of dangerously slippery ice.
